author: A_Brickset_user
title: Very clever product from Lego
review:
While visiting a Lego Outlet store in Washington DC during BrickFest 2004, I came across this unique piece at a great price.  I must admit I have a love for all Lego products that include Johnny Thunder, so this was no exception.  The Lego frame is made from a tan base plate and is very sturdy.  The frame has a clear sheet of plastic to place over the photo but it does make for a tight fit.  

So if you have a Lego fanatic in your household and you want to help them remember who you are, then take a picture of yourself, put it in this frame and give it to them for Christmas.  They will truly love you for the thoughtful gift.

On a side note, I've added many other minifigs to this frame to proudly display the cast of my Lego stop motion film, "Alabama Jones and the Lost Topping of Doom".  Please be sure to visit our web site...

http://www.yellowinkproductions.com/

to see Johnny Thunder in action.
